title: Why can't I dial 1 (or any #) while on a call?
content:
I can't receive Google Voice calls b/c when I dial 1, nothing happens. 

Clearing the cache in the app solves the problem temporarily, but very temporarily. I miss a LOT of phone calls because of this.

I've uninstalled, reinstalled, restarted, cleared storage, etc. I'm not looking for that kind of solution because like I said, that fixes the problem for maybe 30 minutes.
